goal.ch:
Mission statement: To help learners acquire key business communication skills through a dynamic and immersive English learning experience using various modern workplace TV series, plus corresponding book titles and case studies. 

Objective Methods: This course focuses on four aspects of the English language: speaking eloquence, listening competency, vocabulary variety, and communication technology and it aims to help students 1. Use business TV shows to understand real-life English usage in workplace scenarios. 2. Apply knowledge from business books and case studies to analyze show scenarios to boost critical-thinking skills for professional purpose. 3. Simulate or improve how show characters handle challenges at work to enhance problem-solving abilities. 4. Present themselves in practical tasks such as the term project “Business Pitch” to manifest what they have learned.

Expected Outcome: Upon completing the course, students will be prepared to advance their business English communication skills to CEFR Level B2 or higher, as can be verified by official TOEIC or Linguaskill Business test certifications, which will significantly enhance their job prospects.

**課程內容與評量始自第一週，有選上或有興趣加選的同學，都請準時到課，避免成績損失。
**語言學習需要定期付出時間與努力才易有成效。
**課程須知會陸續公告於新ee-class系統: https://ncueeclass.ncu.edu.tw/，同學要每週追蹤網站上的注意事項。
